dashboard.heading: Submissions and assessments of programming exercise "{{exerciseTitle}}"

programmingAssessment.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel the assessment? Your current assessment progress will be deleted and the submission will be available for assessment to other tutors again.
programmingAssessment.notFound: We couldn't find any unassessed programming submissions, please go back.
programmingAssessment.issuesTooltip: Issues: {{ percentage }}% of all detected issues.
programmingAssessment.deductionsTooltip: Deductions: {{ percentage }}% of all deducted points.
programmingAssessment.codeIssueNotApplied: This issue does not deduct the maximum number of possible points, since similar code issues already deduct enough points. If this was the only issue, it would deduct {{points}} points.
